## Annotation hits for candiate regions

- We will search only within the candidate regions

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(Rgff)
library(ape)
chr100_gff <- read.gff("/fs/cbsubscb16/storage/rkc/genome/king_crab_annotation_chr100.gff3")

chr100_gff_outliers <- chr49_gff %>% filter(start > 10744000 & end < 11051000) %>% arrange(start)
```
